snippet: Texas A&M hosts Florida for its first SEC game, and on top of the intrigue of the Aggies’ new system and quarterback, the teams have traded barbs.
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M hosts Florida for its first SEC game, and on top of the intrigue of the Aggies’ new system and quarterback, the teams have traded barbs.

headline.seo: For First SEC Game, Texas A&M Is Making Rival in Florida
headline.main: New SEC Opponents Have the Look of Old Rivals
headline.print_headline: New SEC Opponents Have the Look of Old Rivals
